content: A retrospective analysis of telepresence therapy utilization in the Midwest region revealed a 22% increase in claims for speech pathology services among children aged 8-12 between Q3 2022 and Q1 2023. The study noted particular adoption spikes in Ohio following the implementation of the Medicare Coverage Improvement Initiative (MCII-45b). Providers reported reduced no-show rates for rural populations but expressed concerns about reimbursement delays.
